com.redhat.rhn.common.messaging

Class MessageQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.messaging.MessageQueue

  • public class MessageQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that passes messages from the sender to an action class

      • getRegisteredEventNames

        public static java.lang.String[] getRegisteredEventNames()

        Returns:
